{{Location Intro|The '''Anemo Archon Statue'''|description=<p>{{If Self|Anemo Archon Statue|It|The Anemo Archon Statue}} is located at the plaza in front of the [[Favonius Cathedral]]. The statue is in the image of the Anemo Archon, [[Barbatos]], with a hood, two wings, and its hands cupped together.</p><!--

--><p>There is a sentence carved into the statue's pedestal, reading {{Script|teyvat|The Gateway of Celestia}}.</p>}}

==NPCs==
* [[Aramis]] - Knight of Favonius
* [[Grace]] - Sister (Daytime)
* [[Monroe]] (Daytime)
* [[Nora]] (Daytime)
* [[Sayid]] - Traveling Scholar (Daytime)
* [[Six-Fingered José]] - Bard (Daytime)
* [[Susie]] (Daytime)
* [[Vile]] - Informant (Daytime)

==Trivia==
* Sitting on the statue's hands grants the {{Achievement|Beloved of the Anemo Archon}}.
* The player can initiate a minigame that involves running through hoops around the plaza perimeter. Running through all the hoops will grant a [[Luxurious Chest]].
